results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 3dfbf0678b6349968be37ff13d63be81. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when using passwords with special characters
arguments.success_criteria: All character types (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, symbols) are supported and regression tests confirm login functionality works with special characters

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 8a903302d53840d7abe2603be4fa4e0c:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
